chart_description: The Netdata Query Timings chart displays the timings of various stages in a query execution pipeline of the Netdata database engine. These timings may help in identifying which stages of the pipeline are taking longer to complete and might be causing performance issues.

dimension_descriptions.init: The time taken for initializing a query.
dimension_descriptions.next page disk fast: The time taken for fetching the next page of data from disk when the read operation is performed from a fast disk.
dimension_descriptions.next page disk slow: The time taken for fetching the next page of data from disk when the read operation is performed from a slow disk.
dimension_descriptions.next page preload fast: The time taken for prefetching the next page of data from disk when the read operation is performed from a fast disk.
dimension_descriptions.prep wait: The time taken to prepare a query before executing it.
